com.cyc.baseclient

Class CycClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.baseclient.CycClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CycAccess

    public class CycClient
extends Object
implements CycAccess
    Provides wrappers for the Base Client.

    Collaborates with the CycConnection class which manages the api connections.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      FileWriter apiRequestLog 
      boolean areAPIRequestsLoggedToFile
      the indicator that API request forms should be logged to a file api-requests.lisp in the working directory
      protected Comm c 
      protected CycConnectionInterface cycConnection
      Reference to CycConnection object which manages the api connection to the OpenCyc server.
      static boolean DEFAULT_IS_LEGACY_MODE
      Default value for isLegacyMode is no compatibility with older versions of the Base Client.
      protected String hostName
      the Cyc server host name
      protected static long MAX_UNACCESSED_MILLIS
      the maximum time that the CycClient connection is allowed to be unused before establishing a fresh connection (ten hours)
      protected static int OK_RESPONSE_CODE
      the Cyc server OK response code
      static int PERSISTENT_CONNECTION
      Value indicating that the Base Client should use one TCP socket for the entire session.
      int persistentConnection
      Parameter indicating whether the Base Client should use one TCP socket for the entire session, or if the socket is created and then closed for each api call, or if an XML SOAP service provides the message transport.
      protected int port
      the Cyc server host tcp port number
      protected int trace
      the parameter that, when true, causes a trace of the messages to and from the server
      static int XML_SOAP_CONNECTION
      Value indicating that the Base Client should use one TCP socket for the entire session.

      • hasStaticCycServer

        public boolean hasStaticCycServer()
        Does this CycClient access a single Cyc?
        Specified by:
        hasStaticCycServer in interface CycAccess
        Returns:
        true if this CycClient will always access the same Cyc server, and returns false if the CycClient was constructed with a Comm object that may result in different calls being sent to different Cyc servers.

      • importMucExpression

        @Deprecated
public int importMucExpression(CycList mucExpression,
                                 String mtName)
                        throws CycConnectionException,
                               CycApiException
        Deprecated. 
        Imports a MUC (Message Understanding Conference) formatted symbolic expression into cyc via the function which parses the expression and creates assertions for the contained concepts and relations between them.
        Parameters:
        mucExpression - the MUC (Message Understanding Conference) formatted symbolic expression
        mtName - the name of the microtheory in which the imported assertions will be made
        Returns:
        the number of assertions imported from the input MUC expression
        Throws:
        IOException - if a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error
        CycConnectionException

                  throws CycConnectionException
        Returns true if this KB is an OpenCyc image.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if this KB is an OpenCyc image, otherwise false

      • converse

        protected Object[] converse(Object command)
                     throws CycConnectionException,
                            CycApiException
        Converses with Cyc to perform an API command. Creates a new connection for this command if the connection is not persistent.
        Parameters:
        command - the command string or CycArrayList
        Returns:
        the result as an object array of two objects
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException - if cyc server host not found on the network or a data communication error occurs
        CycApiException - if the api request results in a cyc server error
        See Also:
        CycConnectionInterface.converse(Object)

      • converseWithRetrying

        protected Object[] converseWithRetrying(Object command)
                                 throws CycApiException,
                                        CycConnectionException
        Send a command to Cyc, and maybe try to recover from a closed connection.
        Parameters:
        command - - String, CycArrayList, or Worker
        Returns:
        the results of evaluating the command
        Throws:
        CycApiException
        IOException
        CycConnectionException
        See Also:
        getReestablishClosedConnections(), CycConnection.converse(java.lang.Object), CycConnection.converseBinary(com.cyc.base.conn.Worker)
